replies.author: Annemarie
replies.text: trolls seem to be pointing to HRC's friendship with Senator Robert Byrd as suspect. Byrd was a klan member in his youth, and like many so-called Dixiecrats, he was against the Civil Rights Act. It's the reason why so many southern Democrats left the party and became Republicans. Nixon courted them with his Southern Strategy. But by the time Byrd and Clinton became friends, he'd become a strong defender of civil rights, and called joining the klan the worst mistake of his life. He spent the rest of his life atoning for his youthful mistakes, supporting civil rights, and speaking out against racism. So see, racist Trump trolls - there's a chance for you yet! Maybe you'll realize the error of your ways!
